ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Leo Morey,Tom Hickey,Rudy Palais,Ogden Whitney,Leo Morey,Tom Hickey,Rudy Palais
ComicInfo.Title: The Endless Rooms!; Mysterious Island; Child of Evil; The Ghost of the Museum!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Endless Rooms!: A cutthroat businessman is killed in a traffic accident and finds he is doomed to be tortured by demonic versions of his victims for all eternity.
Mysterious Island: During World War II, the lone survivor of a sunken American freighter washes up on an island, where he miraculously regains his youth. After making his way back to civilization, he tries to find the island again, but it has vanished.
Child of Evil: An alien race, fearing that the child left behind by the last two evil people on their planet, decide to send the child to Earth.
The Ghost of the Museum!: Jim Denton opens a museum of the old west and finds that the covered wagon he purchased is haunted.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Pierre Alonzo,Pierce Rand,Lafcadio Lee,Pierre Alonzo,Pierce Rand,Lafcadio Lee
